content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a browse_website command from the user and opened the website https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html. Additional unique characteristics of octopuses include the ability to change color and texture, regenerate limbs, squirt ink as a defense mechanism, have blue blood due to the copper-based protein haemocyanin, and have three hearts. The supposedly solitary gloomy octopus was also found to build underwater cities and exhibit aggression in densely populated settlements. I received a command from the user to get hyperlinks from the website, but it failed due to too much output. The user also generated an image of an octopus and saved it to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/0ba31036-257a-47ab-b4e7-ad410c4f7829.jpg, and wrote the website URL to a file named octopus_urls.txt. When the user commanded me to read the file octopus_urls.txt, I returned the URL https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "generate_image", "args": {"prompt": "Octopus"}}}'}]
"""
